body: You are resistant to the magic of other faiths. You gain a +2 trait bonus on all Will saves you attempt against divine spells. This bonus does not apply against divine spells cast by a caster who worships the same deity you do.
name: Disdainful Defender
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Basic Traits/Faith Traits/Disdainful Defender
